name: CVE-2020-35136
description: Dolibarr 12.0.3 is vulnerable to authenticated Remote Code Execution. An attacker who has the access the admin dashboard can manipulate the backup function by inserting a payload into the filename for the zipfilename_template parameter to admin/tools/dolibarr_export.php.

external_references.description: This object was created using cve2stix from the Signals Corps.
